sku: SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) = Kòd ou kreye pou idantifye pwodui ou.
asin: ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number) = Nimewo inik pou chak pwodui sou Amazon.
fba: FBA (Fulfillment by Amazon) = Amazon estoke, anbale, epi voye pwodui ou pou ou.
fbm: FBM (Fulfillment by Merchant) = Ou menm ki jere stock ak shipping pwodui ou.
serving quantity: Serving Quantity se kantite pòsyon ki nan yon sache oswa bwat pwodui.
serving size: Serving Size se kantite manje pou yon sèl pòsyon. Egzanp: 2 cookies, 30g, 1 bar.
kalkile pri: Cost + Amazon fees + shipping + prep + pwofi. Pa mete pri anba total depans.
ajoute inventory fba: Inventory > Manage FBA Inventory > chwazi pwodui > Send/Replenish Inventory > mete kantite > Prepare shipment.
ajoute inventory fbm: Inventory > Manage All Inventory > Edit listing > Quantity (FBM) > mete kantite > Save.
ajoute nouvo pwodui: Inventory > Add a Product > chèche ASIN oswa non pwodui > Sell this product > mete condition/prix/qty > Save & Finish.
shipping plan: Inventory > Send to Amazon > chwazi atik > Pack type > mete qty > Confirm > Prepare shipment.
voye inventory lakay: Create Removal Order > Return to Address.
stranded inventory: Ale Stranded Inventory omwen 1 fwa pa semenn.
reimbursement: Amazon remèt ou lajan pou stock ki pèdi, domaje, oswa pa konte byen. Reports > Fulfillment > Payments > Reimbursements.
ungate nike: Nike se yon brand trè pwoteje. Gen moun ki teste achte 10 unit menm SKU sou soccer.com epi soumèt invoice lan bay Amazon, men li pa garanti.
website ungating: Frontier Co-op, UNFI, KeHE, Nassau Candy, RangeMe, Faire (nan kèk kategori).
unit ungate: An jeneral 10 unit menm pwodui sou invoice lan.
kondisyon invoice: Non biznis, adres biznis, dat mwens pase 90 jou, non distribitè, SKU, quantity.
resi walmart: Non. Amazon bezwen invoice biznis, pa retail receipt.
resi target: Non. Amazon bezwen invoice biznis, pa retail receipt.
chan pri: Seller Central > Inventory > Manage All Inventory > Edit > Price > Save.
chanje pri: Seller Central > Inventory > Manage All Inventory > Edit > Price > Save.
chanpri: Seller Central > Inventory > Manage All Inventory > Edit > Price > Save.
kalkile: Cost + Amazon fees + shipping + prep + pwofi. Pa mete pri anba total depans.
buy box: Se bouton 'Add to Cart' la. Pou w genyen l: pri konpetitif, bon account health, ak FBA (pi vit).
ip complaint: Lè yon brand di ou pa gen dwa vann pwodui yo. Sispann vann li imedyatman epi eseye jwenn lèt otorizasyon.
invoice: Dokiman bò kote distribitè ki gen: non biznis ou, dat (<90 jou), ak omwen 10 unit.
loa: Letter of Authorization. Se yon lèt ofisyèl brand lan ba ou pou di ou gen dwa vann pwodui yo sou Amazon.
bestseller rank: BSR montre kijan yon pwodui ap vann nan kategori l. Pi piti nimewo a, pi vit l ap vann.
bsr: BSR montre kijan yon pwodui ap vann nan kategori l. Pi piti nimewo a, pi vit l ap vann.
keepa: Zouti prensipal pou wè istorik pri ak BSR yon pwodui sou Amazon.
referral fee: Komisyon Amazon pran sou chak vann (an jeneral 15%).
fba fee: Frè Amazon pran pou l stoke ak voye pwodui a (li depann de pwa ak gwosè).
storage fee: Lajan Amazon chaje chak mwa pou espas pwodui ou pran nan depo yo.
gtin exemption: Lè w mande Amazon dwa pou w kreye yon listing san kòd bar (UPC).
upc: Kòd bar (12 chif) ou bezwen pou w anrejistre yon nouvo pwodui.
private label: Lè w kreye pwòp mak pa w epi w mete l sou yon pwodui.
wholesale: Lè w achte an gwo dirèkteman bò kote yon distribitè oswa yon brand.
arbitrage: Lè w achte pwodui nan magazen (Retail) oswa sou sit (Online) pou w revann yo pi chè.
oa: Online Arbitrage: Achte sou sit tankou Walmart/Target pou revann sou Amazon.
ra: Retail Arbitrage: Ale nan magazen fizik pou chèche pwodui pou revann.
suppressed listing: Lè listing ou a pa parèt nan rechèch paske li manke enfòmasyon (tankou imaj oswa kategori).
active listing: Lè pwodui ou a ap kouri epi moun ka achte l.
inbound: Estati inventory ou lè l ap voye nan depo Amazon men li poko rive.
reserved: Lè Amazon ap deplase stock ou ant depo yo oswa yon kliyan fèk achte l.
buy box price: Pri ki genyen bouton 'Add to Cart' la kounye a.
ki website amazon pi souvan aksepte pou: Frontier Co-op, UNFI, KeHE, Nassau Candy, RangeMe, Faire (nan kèk kategori).
lead time: Kantite tan sa pran distribitè a pou l voye pwodui a ba ou.
prep center: Yon sèvis ki resevwa pwodui ou, mete label, epi voye yo nan depo Amazon pou ou.
label: FNSKU: Kòd bar Amazon mete sou pwodui a pou konnen se pou ou li ye.
return: Sou Amazon, gen 2 kalite: FBA (Amazon jere tout bagay) ak FBM (Ou dwe enspekte pwodui a anvan ou ranbouse).
retounen: Si se FBA, Amazon ap resevwa l pou ou. Si se FBM, ou dwe bay kliyan an yon shipping label pou li voye l ba ou.
return label: Pou FBM: Ale nan Orders > Manage Returns > Approve > Amazon ap voye yon kòd bay kliyan an oswa ou ka voye pa w.
ranbouse: Refund: Toujou tcheke kondisyon pwodui a anvan. Ou gen 2 jou ouvrab pou w fè refund la apre ou fin resevwa l.
refund: Ou ka fè full refund oswa partial refund si pwodui a rive domaje pa fòt kliyan an.
return address: Asire w adrès retounen ou kòrèk nan Settings > Account Info > Return Address.
fba return: Amazon ap mete l tounen nan inventory si li 'Sellable'. Si li 'Unsellable', ou dwe kreye yon Removal Order.
fbm return: Ou gen kontwòl sou li. Ou ka chwazi 'Authorize' oswa 'Close' request la si li pa respekte delè 30 jou a.
customer damaged: Lè yon kliyan domaje yon pwodui, Amazon pa remèt ou lajan. Ou ka mande yo voye l ba ou pou w wè si w ka ranje l.
return policy: Pifò pwodui sou Amazon gen yon delè 30 jou pou kliyan an retounen yo.
restocking fee: Amazon pa pèmèt restocking fee fasil ankò, men ou ka dedwi lajan si pwodui a tounen nan move kondisyon (Graded Return).
